summary: A WIP mod that allows you to craft pauldrons, greaves, and cuirasses to wear individually or combined for better customization of your character.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will allow you to craft a variety of pauldrons, greaves, and cuirasses seperately so you have more freedom in armor choice. This is a WIP and I am relatively new to modding, but will continue to fix what I can. I received permission from Mopel to take over his work in "Pauldrons and Greaves" as a new file, and so far have fixed 3 major issues as of version 1.0.

[u]Fixes:

[/u][list]
[*]No more underwear clipping through [u]vanilla[/u] armors.
[*]Greaves can no longer be worn with vanilla armor.
[/list][list]
[*]Cuirasses can now be worn without any greaves on (previously legs would become invisible)
[/list]
[u]Issues:

[/u][list]
[*]Cuirasses have pauldrons attached, so craftable pauldrons can be stacked over them.
[*]Leather greaves are invisible.
[*]some pauldrons are a bit oversized.
[*]known incompatibility with bandolier bags and pouches, currently working on a patch.
[*]Incompatible with UNP and CBBE.
[/list]
[u]Features:

[/u][list]
[*]MCM menu for adjusting tempering and armor rating.
[*]Pauldrons can be mixed and matched (each have individual slots)
[*]Sliders to adjust armor weight in the skyproc patcher (i myself haven't done this, but was a feature from Mopel's version)
[/list] [u]
Requirements: (for MCM menu)
[/u]
[list]
[*]SKSE
[*]SkyUI
[/list]
-If you like the mod please endorse it so we can spread the word and make more improvements.

-Please feel free to report anything wrong with the mod, there are definitely improvements to be made. Any help/donations would be greatly appreciated and would allow me to spend more of my time working on this mod. I know that I am able to completely fix the mod and nearly perfect it....but that is gonna take a long time. This is simply what I have been able to accomplish in my spare time. I hope you guys enjoy the mod and can help me out with this.
author: jabr192
